member.name: M:TurnInAutomationBatch.Common.LogHelper.WriteToLogFile(TurnInAutomationBatch.BLL.Enumerations.LogEntryType,System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether log file for today is present or not. If its present, then it appends the text to the log file. If not, it creates the log file and writes the text.

member.summary: Writes the log messages to the console only if it is in debug mode

member.summary: Deletes the log files that were modified before the threshold date
